subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Benjamin Raich of Austria captured a World Cup giant slalom title, edging Ted Ligety of the United States by one-hundredth of a second. Raich won in a combined time of 2 minutes, 24.61 seconds on the Birds of Prey course in Beaver Creek, Colo. Bode Miller skidded off the course.
